about_the_game:
Sara has been betrayed by criminals. Once she realizes what has happened, she embarks on a dangerous and thrilling journey to claim the money that is rightfully hers and face them!

On her quest, Sara must solve numerous tricky riddles and challenging puzzles. Each solved task brings her a step closer to the truth and uncovers more about the criminals schemes. She travels to various locations across Europe, each full of secrets and hidden clues waiting to be discovered and deciphered.

Join Sara on this captivating journey, support her in her search for clues, and be by her side as she faces the criminals. Immerse yourself in a world full of excitement and adventure, where every decision counts and every detail is important. Help Sara achieve justice and right the wrongs that have been done to her!
